00023 #include "BaseNetwLayer.h"
00024 
00025 #include <cassert>
00026 
00027 #include "NetwControlInfo.h"
00028 #include "BaseMacLayer.h"
00029 #include "AddressingInterface.h"
00030 #include "SimpleAddress.h"
00031 #include "FindModule.h"
00032 #include "NetwPkt_m.h"
00033 #include "ArpInterface.h"
00034 #include "NetwToMacControlInfo.h"

00036 Define_Module(BaseNetwLayer);
00037 
00038 void BaseNetwLayer::initialize(int stage)
00039 {
00040     BaseLayer::initialize(stage);
00041 
00042     if(stage==0){
00043       coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue();
00044         headerLength= par("headerLength");
00045         arp = FindModule<ArpInterface*>::findSubModule(findHost());
00046     }
00047     else if(stage == 1) {
00048       // see if there is an addressing module available
00049       // otherwise use module id as network address
00050         AddressingInterface* addrScheme = FindModule<AddressingInterface*>
00051 													::findSubModule(findHost());
00052         if(addrScheme) {
00053           myNetwAddr = addrScheme->myNetwAddr(this);
00054         } else {
00055           myNetwAddr = LAddress::L3Type( getId() );
00056         }
00057         coreEV << " myNetwAddr " << myNetwAddr << std::endl;
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00064 cMessage* BaseNetwLayer::decapsMsg(NetwPkt *msg)
00065 {
00066     cMessage *m = msg->decapsulate();
00067     setUpControlInfo(m, msg->getSrcAddr());
00068     // delete the netw packet
00069     delete msg;
00070     return m;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00078 NetwPkt* BaseNetwLayer::encapsMsg(cPacket *appPkt) {
00079     LAddress::L2Type macAddr;
00080     LAddress::L3Type netwAddr;
00081 
00082     coreEV <<"in encaps...\n";
00083 
00084     NetwPkt *pkt = new NetwPkt(appPkt->getName(), appPkt->getKind());
00085     pkt->setBitLength(headerLength);
00086 
00087     cObject* cInfo = appPkt->removeControlInfo();
00088 
00089     if(cInfo == NULL){
00090   EV << "warning: Application layer did not specifiy a destination L3 address\n"
00091      << "\tusing broadcast address instead\n";
00092   netwAddr = LAddress::L3BROADCAST;
00093     } else {
00094   coreEV <<"CInfo removed, netw addr="<< NetwControlInfo::getAddressFromControlInfo( cInfo ) << std::endl;
00095         netwAddr = NetwControlInfo::getAddressFromControlInfo( cInfo );
00096   delete cInfo;
00097     }
00098 
00099     pkt->setSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00100     pkt->setDestAddr(netwAddr);
00101     coreEV << " netw "<< myNetwAddr << " sending packet" <<std::endl;
00102     if(LAddress::isL3Broadcast( netwAddr )) {
00103         coreEV << "sendDown: nHop=L3BROADCAST -> message has to be broadcasted"
00104            << " -> set destMac=L2BROADCAST\n";
00105         macAddr = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00106     }
00107     else{
00108         coreEV <<"sendDown: get the MAC address\n";
00109         macAddr = arp->getMacAddr(netwAddr);
00110     }
00111 
00112     setDownControlInfo(pkt, macAddr);
00113 
00114     //encapsulate the application packet
00115     pkt->encapsulate(appPkt);
00116     coreEV <<" pkt encapsulated\n";
00117     return pkt;
00118 }
00119 
00128 void BaseNetwLayer::handleLowerMsg(cMessage* msg)
00129 {
00130     NetwPkt *m = static_cast<NetwPkt *>(msg);
00131     coreEV << " handling packet from " << m->getSrcAddr() << std::endl;
00132     sendUp(decapsMsg(m));
00133 }
00134 
00145 void BaseNetwLayer::handleUpperMsg(cMessage* msg)
00146 {
00147   assert(dynamic_cast<cPacket*>(msg));
00148     sendDown(encapsMsg(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg)));
00149 }
00150 
00162 void BaseNetwLayer::handleLowerControl(cMessage* msg)
00163 {
00164   switch (msg->getKind())
00165   {
00166   case BaseMacLayer::TX_OVER:
00167     delete msg;
00168     break;
00169   default:
00170     EV << "BaseNetwLayer does not handle control messages called "
00171        << msg->getName() << std::endl;
00172     delete msg;
00173     break;
00174   }
00175 }
00176 
00180 cObject* BaseNetwLayer::setDownControlInfo(cMessage *const pMsg, const LAddress::L2Type& pDestAddr)
00181 {
00182   return NetwToMacControlInfo::setControlInfo(pMsg, pDestAddr);
00183 }
00184 
00188 cObject* BaseNetwLayer::setUpControlInfo(cMessage *const pMsg, const LAddress::L3Type& pSrcAddr)
00189 {
00190   return NetwControlInfo::setControlInfo(pMsg, pSrcAddr);
00191 }
